name: Afternoon Tea Party
description: Enjoy a delightful afternoon tea at our shop. A selection of our finest cakes will be served.

name: Birthday Cake Party
description: Celebrate your birthday with us! We'll provide a special birthday cake for your party.

name: Wedding Celebration
description: Celebrate the most important day of your life with some incredible treats! We'll provide a special cake for your wedding.

name: Conference Meeting
description: Work doesn't have to be all doom and gloom. Make it brighter with some tasty treats.
